quotes.quote: The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Love doesn’t make the world go round. Love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.quote: We accept the love we think we deserve.
quotes.author: Stephen Chbosky

quotes.quote: Love is an untamed force. When we try to control it, it destroys us. When we try to imprison it, it enslaves us. When we try to understand it, it leaves us feeling lost and confused.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: A great marriage is not when the ‘perfect couple’ comes together. It is when an imperfect couple learns to enjoy their differences.
quotes.author: Dave Meurer

quotes.quote: Infatuation is when you think he’s as sexy as Robert Redford, as smart as Henry Kissinger, as noble as Ralph Nader, as funny as Woody Allen, and as athletic as Jimmy Conners. Love is when you realize that he’s as sexy as Woody Allen, as smart as Jimmy Connors, as funny as Ralph Nader, as athletic as Henry Kissinger and nothing like Robert Redford – but you’ll take him anyway.
quotes.author: Judith Viorst

quotes.quote: Love never dies a natural death. It dies because we don’t know how to replenish its source. It dies of blindness and errors and betrayals. It dies of illness and wounds; it dies of weariness, of witherings, of tarnishings.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: Love me when I least deserve it, because that’s when I really need it.
quotes.author: Swedish Proverb

quotes.quote: Don’t make love by the garden gate, love is blind but the neighbors ain’t.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Love does not dominate; it cultivates.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind, and therefore is winged Cupid painted blind.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Love can touch us one time and last for a lifetime.
quotes.author: Celine Dion

quotes.quote: You know it’s love when all you want is that person to be happy, even if you’re not part of their happiness.
quotes.author: Julia Roberts

quotes.quote: You know you’re in love when you can’t fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: When you trip over love, it is easy to get up. But when you fall in love, it is impossible to stand again.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: If I had a flower for every time I thought of you...I could walk through my garden forever.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: When you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: If you love somebody, let them go, for if they return, they were always yours. And if they don’t, they never were.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Love is a friendship set to music.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Trip over love, you can get up. Fall in love and you fall forever.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Gravitation is not responsible for people falling in love.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: A successful relationship requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Love doesn't make the world go round, love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Browning

quotes.quote: The most precious possession that ever comes to a man in this world is a woman's heart.
quotes.author: Josiah G. Holland

quotes.quote: Immature love says: 'I love you because I need you.' Mature love says 'I need you because I love you.'
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: The greatest pleasure of life is love.
quotes.author: Euripedes

quotes.quote: Love is the only sane and satisfactory answer to the problem of human existence.
quotes.author: Eric Fromm

quotes.quote: True love comes quietly, without banners or flashing lights. If you hear bells, get your ears checked.
quotes.author: Erich Segal

quotes.quote: Love makes your soul crawl out from its hiding place.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.quote: We can only learn to love by loving.
quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

quotes.quote: There is no greater happiness for a man than approaching a door at the end of a day knowing someone on the other side of that door is waiting for the sound of his footsteps.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.
quotes.author: Loretta Young

quotes.quote: Love isn't a decision, it's a feeling. If we could decide who we loved, it would be much simpler, but much less magical.
quotes.author: Trey Parker

quotes.quote: Love is always open arms. If you close your arms about love you will find that you are left holding only yourself.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: No road is long with good company.
quotes.author: Turkish Proverb

quotes.quote: Love is like a friendship caught on fire. In the beginning a flame, very pretty, often hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. As love grows older, our hearts mature and our love becomes as coals, deep-burning and unquenchable.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Love is a game that two can play and both win.
quotes.author: Eva Gabor

quotes.quote: Once in a lifetime, you find someone who sees what nobody else sees, hears what nobody else hears, and feels what nobody else feels.
quotes.author: Anonymous
